name: tooljump-chrome-extension
description: ToolJump Chrome Extension: Connect your dev tools (GitHub, AWS, monitoring, etc.) so knowledge and navigation live where engineers work - no context switching, no tribal knowledge.

scripts.build: yarn clean && npm-run-all --parallel build:popup build:main build:background && yarn copy-manifest
scripts.copy-manifest: cp manifest.json dist/ && cp -r icons dist/
scripts.build:dev: yarn clean && npm-run-all --parallel build:popup:dev build:main:dev build:background:dev && yarn copy-manifest
scripts.package: yarn build && yarn check && yarn create-zip
scripts.create-zip: cd dist && zip -r ../tooljump-extension.zip . && cd .. && echo 'Extension packaged as tooljump-extension.zip'
scripts.create-zip:dev: cd dist && zip -r ../tooljump-extension-dev.zip . && cd .. && echo 'Development extension packaged as tooljump-extension-dev.zip'
